ClassDesc: A convenience class to aid in implementing an AppWidget provider. Everything you can do with AppWidgetProvider, you can do with a regular @B_android#content#BroadcastReceiver_E@. AppWidgetProvider merely parses the relevant fields out of the Intent that is received in @B_android#appwidget#AppWidgetProvider#onReceive_E@, and calls hook methods with the received extras. Extend this class and override one or more of the @B_android#appwidget#AppWidgetProvider#onUpdate_E@, @B_android#appwidget#AppWidgetProvider#onDeleted_E@, @B_android#appwidget#AppWidgetProvider#onEnabled_E@ or @B_android#appwidget#AppWidgetProvider#onDisabled_E@ methods to implement your own AppWidget functionality.
